name: Water Bomb
description:
* Water Bomb *

This is Totally New Concept for Game Lover.You're in for some action and adventure during your water bomb.

***CONSTANT CHALLENGES AND ENDLESS FUN***

Only by jumping up the platforms can you reach your goal in time.
Make sure you land correctly, for if you miss a platform you could fall to your doom.
Watch out for the tricky obstacles and dangerous Bomb.
Worse yet are your enemies Like Water Bomb who want nothing more than to attack and defeat you!

FEATURES:

- Land on constantly changing array of platforms
- Collect endless supply of gems to boost your wealth
- Cool Graphics And Sound
- Different 10 Level To Easy to Hard

Feedback is greatly appreciated and will help improve the game.

So Don't Wait Download Todays And Play with this New Concept of Gameing
